text: Neoi Epivates () is a small suburban town outside Thessaloniki, next to Peraia. It is part of the municipality of Thermaikos in the Thessaloniki regional unit.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The origin of the settlement was the arrival of 631 refugees from the town Epivates in Eastern Thrace as a result of the Greco-Turkish War (1919–22). It was formerly known in Turkish as Bahçe Çiflik (), mentioned also in a popular song of Vassilis Tsitsanis. ==References== Category:Populated places in Thessaloniki (regional unit)
